full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO'I SBYIN SREG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI @004B YANG LNGA PHYIR DON GNYER CAN MANG POS YANG YANG BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING NYE CHAR DAD LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RDO RJES RGYUN DU NYAMS LEN PHYIR ZA BYED RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO'I SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I SNYAN RGYUD 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA NI GZIM CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,) 'DI KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHNG RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,
